722282f-b.title: Manhattan: Park Avenue - 58th Street
722282f-b.text:
(1)
Park Avenue, east side, from 58th to 59th Streets, seen from
across the clearing on the N.W. corner of 58th Street where a
twenty-story apartment building will be erected. 485 Park
Avenue, built about 1923, replaced two small garages on the
N.E. corner of 58th Street. Beyond it on 58th Street may be
seen the facade of old Liederkranz Hell, from which the cheese
derived its name.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, showing the entire Anderson Galleries building in
the northern half of the block. Compara the view of this
block in 1917.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(3)
The Anderson Galleries, and showing also its East 59th
Street side.
June 11, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713954f-a.title: Manhattan: 58th Street - Park Avenue
713954f-a.text:
58th Street, south side, west from but not including Park Avenue,
showing the new Squibb Building, at the S.E. corner of Fifth
AVenue.
About 1929.
Ewing Galloway.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713953f-a.title: Manhattan: 58th Street (East) - Park Avenue
713953f-a.text:
(1)
Liederkrantz Hall, 115 East 58th Street, adjoining N.E. corner
of Fark Avenue.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The sawme, showing the south wing of Liederkrantz Hall.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713953f-b.title: Manhattan: 58th Street (East) - Park Avenue
713953f-b.text:
(1)
Liederkrantz Hall, 115 East 58th Street, adjoining N.E. corner

July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The sawme, showing the south wing of Liederkrantz Hall.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

713955f-b.title: Manhattan: 58th Street - Park Avenue
713955f-b.text:
(1)
58th Street, north side, west from and including Fark Avenue.
The Hotel Clarendon stands on the N.W. corner of Park Avenue,
and beyond it is the New England.
April 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
Nka ~ 2oc:
(2)
The same, after the demolition of the Clarendon and New England.
July 3, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722287f-a.title: Manhattan: Park Avenue - 58th Street (East)
722287f-a.text:
Park Ave., west side, south from and including East 59th Street and
showing prominently at the S.W. corner of same, No. 500, the executive
offices of the Board of Education. The 20-story structure adjacent to
same is an apartment house, No. 480 Park Ave., at the N.W. corner of
East 58th Street.
August 4, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

722281f-a.title: Manhattan: Park Avenue - 58th Street (East)
722281f-a.text:
Park Ave., east side, north from, but not including East 58th Street.
Note the former Anderson Galleries, at the S.E. corner of East 59th Street.
June 11, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
